summary: Replaces the female ragged trousers variant with a topless version in either black or brown.
descriptionHtml:
Annoyed by the fact that the game gives males two prisoner outfits, but females only one?
Jealous at the guys being able to show their beef while still being decent?
Well, then this mod is for you!

It replaces the Ragged Trousers for females with a version that leaves the torso exposed (although with a bra, decency and such, y\'know...). Comes in two different colors, Rags-Brown and Black.
The Non-Replacer version adds 4 different versions of the ragged trousers, in black or brown and with/without bra. They\'re rated as Light Armor, account for the Light Armor perks, and are improvable and craftable under Leather.

I made this \'cause I was disappointed about the lack of a \"just pants\" equivalent for females.

Installation: Just decide which version you like and put the meshes/textures folders into the Skyrim/Data folder.
The Non-Replacer version only needs to be extracted into the Data folder.
The bodyshape was made using Caliente\'s awesome BodySlide program. You might need the CBBEv3 body textures for this mod to look proper.

Please ask me before using this in another mod, or uploading it somewhere else!
author: Zeph Sunstrider
